always_active.description: [bool]Is this target always broadcasting its location for targeting.

use_target_node.description: [bool]Use a node as the target position. Leave disabled if setting manually (eg. laser designator)

target_node.description: [string]Node to be used as the target position.

priority.description: What is the priority of this target. Set higher for things that should be targeted first.

owner_priority.description: What is the priority of this target if the entity and target are both owned by the same player.

requires_target_lock.description: [bool]Do we need to perform a target lock before we can fire the weapon?

target_lock_dot.description: Dot needed for the target to be within

target_crosshair_scale.description: Crosshair threshold to display potential Target

tracking_loop_start.description: [wwise]Sound to play when you start locking on.

tracking_loop_stop.description: [wwise]Sound to play when you stop locking on.

locked_loop_start.description: [wwise]Sound to play when you are locked on.

locked_loop_stop.description: [wwise]Sound to play when you are no longer locked on.
